name: @squonk/sdf-parser
description: A parser for SDF files with streaming support

scripts.lint: if [ $(pnpm c --user get MONOREPO) = true ]; then eslint --cache --max-warnings=0 --resolve-plugins-relative-to="../../libs/eslint-config"; else eslint --cache --max-warnings=0 --resolve-plugins-relative-to="./node_modules/@squonk/eslint-config"; fi
scripts.format: if [ $(pnpm c --user get MONOREPO) = true ]; then eslint --fix --cache --max-warnings=0 --resolve-plugins-relative-to="../../libs/eslint-config"; else eslint --fix --cache --max-warnings=0 --resolve-plugins-relative-to="./node_modules/@squonk/eslint-config"; fi
scripts.format:all: if [ $(pnpm c --user get MONOREPO) = true ]; then eslint --fix . --cache --max-warnings=0 --resolve-plugins-relative-to="../../libs/eslint-config"; else eslint --fix . --cache --max-warnings=0 --resolve-plugins-relative-to="./node_modules/@squonk/eslint-config"; fi
